name: nevernew
text: The alt text is the funniest part of this strip, yet I don't see it.  It's a shame.

name: juancarlos
text: Then why don't you post it chochacho!

name: fermatprime
text: Yeah, I gave it a 5 for the alt text, it'd not even be a 4 otherwise.

name: unakau
text:
Are you guys crazy? The utter confusion that ensues as a result of the wonderful seventh panel is incredible. Definitely a five.

Plus, Molly's got a hell of a tongue in panel three.

name: onstad
text: A comment left by onstad was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, Siah, ford)

name: catachresis
text: Hooray for this. Unless, of course, the new feature doesn't work in my badly outdated Firefox iteration. I am afraid that this is my Problem.

text: member status: Onstad . I love it.

text: Something we can only dream to aspire to.

name: deusoma
text: Three people have lamed Chris Onstad on his own webcomic . Does anyone else notice the madness inherent in this?

name: farqussus
text: I wonder who would lame this comment.

name: rowboat
text: Oh, god. I really don't wanna start shit, but I just can't stop myself! It was NeoNaoNeo, Siah and ford who lamed Mr. Onstad. Sorry guys. But you did lame the guy who created the best comic of this century on his own board, so, you know, you deserve what you get.

name: farqussus
text:
Ahh, well, neonaonobsock is one of those spamming douches, and I suspect the other two did it so they could feel like big men.
'I lamed onstad. That's like the ultimate taboo. I'm so fuckin awesome!"

Excpet they don't know what taboo means as a word.

And they're laming an apology for not speedily completing a task he is under no obligation to bother with.

name: ford

text: A comment left by cryztal was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by daidai, radioelectric, atticusonline, I_Love_Kate, Satyr)

name: i_love_kate
text: I lamed you for kicking a man when he's repentant.

name: cryztal
text: I... I AM SO SORRY.

text: I think you should always post comments like this, to go with your avatar.

name: ford
text: I... forgive you.

name: cryztal
text:
That is mighty big of you.

I'm not sure I am worthy.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
And yette, you stille hafe nott grovelled nore begged fore youre unsavorie and emptie liefe, pricke.
No laemes untille you repente!

name: ford
text: Chubbied for pricke, I have never been called that particular variant.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
You've been abused enought, then. Have a Starbucks and some John Lee Hooker tunes on me.

My tab, that is, as I am not a table, nor an mp3 player.

name: mystkmanat
text: You muft repent!

name: plurabelle
text:
And for each of the 3 opportunities, your chubby and lame ratio has arrived at 1.

Cosmic forces? Circumstances?

name: atticusonline
text: Chris has a huge friggin' Chubby to Comment ratio.

name: atticusonline
text: Or just a huge friggin Chubby, I can't decide.

name: dusty
text: Quite possibly one and then the other.

name: imitationcrab
text: Alt Text: Sorry to give you furries such primo j/o material at work

name: tbtabby
text: Primo? Hardly. Takes more than mammoth boobs on a cat to make top-shelf furry erotica.

name: cryztal
text: Where are the three dicks and five sets of tits?

name: invidious
text: For you, maybe.

name: belgand
text: Those are terrible breasts as well. I would not stare at them unless enraptured by how bad they are. I would probably even point them out to my significant other so we could join together in mocking them for being absolutely awful.

name: selbencoirlo
text:
I liked them so I'm laming you.

I think that I'm developing a thing for corpulent women.

name: epicurus
text: Why is it that guys cannot do that thing? We need to work hard on this and break into this female-dominated area of business.

name: craigola
text: We guys have our own thing, the one where we care that we got caught staring for only about 20 seconds before we find another chest to stare at.

name: primal_in_the_mane
text: I was talking to a guy the other day who told me "I'm 53 and I still haven't gotten over tits". I think not caring is the only option we've got.

name: jackparsons
text: Strangely, I've recently widened my fascinations to asses; perhaps I'm looking for a good brood mare.

name: helloftubby
text: you have gone in the opposite direction to ray

name: scorpio_nadir
text: You don't "get over tits", you develop your peripheral vision over those years God gives you. Sheesh.

text: well THAT response is now filed away for future use!

name: blarghamagarky
text: If you said that to me I would probably be like man. I hope this dude does not update his lj about eating big bacon classics with me.

name: epicurus
text: blarghamagarky , straight up the words I have been trying to find.

name: love_is_so_punk
text: You say "gangbanging" like it's bad.

name: rowboat
text: You say "gangbanging," I say "gongbonging." Let's call the whole thing off!

name: spinynorman
text:
I have proposed marriage as a diversion several times. Twice to a dude when he found out I had drunk all the beer overnight.

Before you ask, yes, it worked.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Hahahaha. Did it go like this:

"Dude, where the fuck is all the beer."
"...Will you marry me?"

name: epicurus
text: Congrats, you just wrote next summer's blockbuster.

name: tekende
text:
(This is the trailer. It is very difficult to represent in text, but I tried.)

This summer

Colin Farrell
"'Ey, who's the piker drank all my beer?"

and
Owen Wilson
"I, uh...will you marry me, man?"
"Wot?! Yeah. Yeah, I will, fuckface! Serves you right for drinkin' all the beer, doe'nt it now?"

are
"Oh my god, what have we done?"

The Accidental Gay Couple
Coming to theaters July 2009. Rated PG-13.

name: mystkmanat
text: I know I'll be waiting in line opening night!

name: centipede_damascus
text: The last panel is so totally hilarious. Osteoporosis is, in fact, a thing that ladies do.

name: spinynorman
text:
ladies are often getting up to all sorts of osteoporosis

it is basic rude if you ask me

name: molesticide
text:
the best solution to this is to let your lady know, in advance, that it is okay for her to check out dudes, as well.

then, when you get caught straight-up checking out a nice pair of naturals or, in some instances when i've got the sack for it, elbowing her and POINTING THEM OUT, you've pretty much got your bases covered.

name: tekende
text: Pointing it out can work surprisingly well sometimes. I think part of the problem with being caught looking at another girl is that you're doing it privately, whereas if you point it out to the lady you are with, it becomes an experience the two of you can share.

name: spillingvelvet
text: that temptress is dressed awfully fancy for wendys.

name: slalvation
text: It's just a regular dress. Some ladies wear them all day.

name: spillingvelvet
text: it makes me think she should be milling around a cocktail party, singing opera.

name: slalvation
text: Some ladies sing opera all day.

name: spillingvelvet
text:
this is true.

some ladies also dress awfully fancy for wendys.

name: aliiis
text: and do osteoporosis

name: stormagnet
text: I kind of picture it as one of those hyper-elaborate goth chick dresses. Late night fast food restaurants and diners are full of them, at least in my experience.

name: spillingvelvet
text: yes, i imagine you could check the tag and it would be morbid threads.  and then they would wither their eyes at you and end up dropping flakes of mascara in their chicken nuggets.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: No more money for poems I guess

name: leia
text: I love this, women totally do do that and I'd never even thought about it. Anyway I love staring at cleavage, I can really appreciate a nice set of tits.

name: tekende
text: This comic makes me want to go to Wendy's for lunch today. This is something I really can't afford to do.

name: tekende
text: Boy, how sad is that? A year ago, I couldn't afford to eat at Wendy's. Pitiful.

name: rowboat
text: Congratulations. Keep it up and maybe this time next year you'll be able to afford Golden Corral.

name: achilleselbow
text: I see that Beef's taste for corpulent women is now fully developed.

name: xiaomimi
text: Hey, "that thing you ladies do" is now a political strategy !

name: direhaggis
text: That is a small amount of food for the well-rounded cat woman with breasts  3 vorpal.

name: direhaggis
text: What in the hell? I can't saunter around the comments page and put down a PLUS sign? It's a plus sign. It's only one of the basic building blocks of civilizations around the whole damn world. Damn you, BBCode. Damn you in your hellish ass.

name: hellofditties
text: I find it so funny that Molly makes the same scowl back while asking "What the hell was that?"

name: lux
text: Beef fails at the indignant fem-scowl. He just kind of juts out his lower lip, like an otter opening his mouth.

name: theryuujin
text:
I have noticed that women will directly confront you when you try to steal one of their tactics, such as the silent treatment.

"What the hell is this, why aren't you talking to me?"
And you're left thinking, 'uh failing at being manipulative.'

Another response I have heard: "Don't be a bitch".

name: carlyle
text: Hee HEE!

name: edana
text: I dunno about anyone else but I totally get sudden-onset osteoperosis every time I catch my guy staring at some other woman's tits
